topics.body:
So... I needed to clear some room on my hard drive, and I decided to check which folders of mine are taking up the most space.

I had 23 gigs of pony pictures. I say had because I've decided to delete that folder and rebuild from scratch, because holy shit I do not have time to go through that and decide what to keep and what to scrap.
